dissatisfaction pile up visiting memphis for a family wedding at hilton we thought it would be great because of previous experience with hilton boy were we wrong we paid 132 night arrived to find out the two room we got where in the basement we did not like that but before we expressed our anger we found out the heater is not working and it was freezing that night
I have worked in customer service and this was by far some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced

This was not about payment but to investigate and improve experience for future customers
